meanings.definition: A type of volcanic ash used in construction.
meanings.sent1: The builders mixed pozz with cement to make the foundation stronger.
meanings.sent2: The construction workers used pozz to reinforce the walls of the building.
meanings.sent3: The pozz made the concrete so tough, it could withstand a dragon attack!
meanings.sent4: The pozz in the mixture was like adding superpowers to the building material.
meanings.sent5: The pozz added a magical touch to the construction, making it indestructible.

meanings.definition: A slang term for a positive or good situation.
meanings.sent1: Finding money in my old jacket pocket was a real pozz!
meanings.sent2: Winning the game was such a pozz for the team.
meanings.sent3: Having an extra day off was a total pozz for me!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a burst of pozz in a gloomy room.
meanings.sent5: The unexpected gift brought a wave of pozz into their lives.
